abstract: An article on Tuesday about Pfizer’s $68 billion acquisition of a rival drug maker, Wyeth, misstated the price of two previous Pfizer acquisitions. The company paid $90 billion, not million, for Warner-Lambert in 2000, and $60 billion, not million, for Pharmacia in 2003.
snippet: An article on Tuesday about Pfizer’s $68 billion acquisition of a rival drug maker, Wyeth, misstated the price of two previous Pfizer acquisitions. The company paid $90 billion, not million, for Warner-Lambert in 2000, and $60 billion, not million...
lead_paragraph: An article on Tuesday about Pfizer’s $68 billion acquisition of a rival drug maker, Wyeth, misstated the price of two previous Pfizer acquisitions. The company paid $90 billion, not million, for Warner-Lambert in 2000, and $60 billion, not million, for Pharmacia in 2003.

abstract: Pfizer‘s mammoth bid for Wyeth is already reverberating through the pharmaceutical world.
lead_paragraph: Pfizer‘s mammoth bid for Wyeth is already reverberating through the pharmaceutical world.

headline.main: Pfizer Bid for Wyeth Bodes Well for Roche Deal
